Post._content:
# docker  docker-compose 
docker 

[docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/linux/docker-ce/ubuntu/)
~~~

~~~

docker-compose 
~~~
sudo curl -L https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.22.0/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m) -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
docker-compose --version
~~~

# 

### 



[](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30172605/how-to-get-into-a-docker-container)

~~~sh
# 
sudo docker exec -t -i container_name /bin/bash 

# 
sudo docker run --name t1 -it --entrypoint /bin/bash  python #python

# Alpine 
# Alpinebash
sudo docker run --rm -it --entrypoint sh python
~~~


### docker-compose 

docker-compose docker-compose.yaml
~~~
#  -d 
sudo docker-compose up -d

# 
sudo docker-compose up --build

#  web
sudo docker-compose run web env

# 
sudo docker-compose stop

# 
sudo docker-compose down --volumes

# 
sudo docker-compose up -d --no-recreate
~~~

#  

###  docker-compose 

 mysql redis rabbitmq

docker-compose.yaml 
 3.2volumesmount bind
~~~yaml
version: '3.2'
services:
  redis:
    image: "redis"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - type: bind
        source: /home/ubuntu/redis-data
        target: /data
    environment:
    - HELLO=hyman
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes

  mysql:
    image: "mysql:5.7"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "3306:3306"
    environment:
    - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456

  rabbitmq:
    image: "rabbitmq:3-management"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "5672:5672"
    - "15672:15672"
~~~

### redis


~~~
#  iptables 
docker run -p 6379:6379 --name myredis --restart always --mount type=bind,src=/home/ubuntu/redis-data,dst=/data -d redis redis-server --appendonly yes 

~~~

### mysql


~~~
sudo docker run --restart always --name my-mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql:5.7

~~~
Post.raw:
---
layout: default
title: 
date:   2018-08-14 16:16:01 
categories: docker
---
# docker  docker-compose 
docker 

[docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/linux/docker-ce/ubuntu/)
~~~

~~~

docker-compose 
~~~
sudo curl -L https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.22.0/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m) -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
docker-compose --version
~~~

[](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30172605/how-to-get-into-a-docker-container)

~~~sh
# 
sudo docker exec -t -i container_name /bin/bash

sudo docker run --name t1 -it --entrypoint /bin/bash  python #python

sudo docker run --rm -it --entrypoint sh python
~~~


### docker-compose 

docker-compose docker-compose.yaml
~~~
#  -d 
sudo docker-compose up -d

# 
sudo docker-compose up --build

#  web
sudo docker-compose run web env

# 
sudo docker-compose stop

# 
sudo docker-compose down --volumes

# 
sudo docker-compose up -d --no-recreate
~~~

#  

###  docker-compose 

 mysql redis rabbitmq

docker-compose.yaml 
 3.2volumesmount bind
~~~yaml
version: '3.2'
services:
  redis:
    image: "redis"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - type: bind
        source: /home/ubuntu/redis-data
        target: /data
    environment:
    - HELLO=hyman
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes

  mysql:
    image: "mysql:5.7"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "3306:3306"
    environment:
    - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456

  rabbitmq:
    image: "rabbitmq:3-management"
    restart: always
    ports:
    - "5672:5672"
    - "15672:15672"

### redis

docker run -p 6379:6379 --name myredis --restart always --mount type=bind,src=/home/ubuntu/redis-data,dst=/data -d redis redis-server --appendonly yes 

~~~

### mysql


~~~
sudo docker run --restart always --name my-mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql:5.7

~~~

Post.title: VurPress
Post.author: eleksbai
Post._content:
##  nodejs 

ubuntu20.04vuepress.

```shell
#  ubuntu 20.04
sudo apt install nodejs
sudo apt install npm
cnpm install -g vuepress
```

hyman@hyman-MS-7A37:~$ node -v
v10.19.0
hyman@hyman-MS-7A37:~$ npm -v
6.14.4

#### cnpm 

```shell
sudo npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com
cnpm install --global yarn
sudo ln -s /opt/programs/nodejs/node-v16.17.1-linux-x64/bin/yarn /usr/local/bin/yarn
yarn config set registry https://registry.npmmirror.com
```

npm
https://developer.aliyun.com/article/801032

yarn 

##  docs/.vuepress/config.js

1 



## 

```shell
cnpm install @vuepress/plugin-back-to-top
cnpm install @vuepress/plugin-pwa
```

##  vssue

[](https://vssue.js.org/guide/gitee.html)
[vuepress ](https://vssue.js.org/guide/vuepress.html#vuepress-plugin)
[demo](https://gitee.com/meteor_lxy/vssue-demo)
[](https://gitee.com/api/v5/oauth_doc#/)
 gitee

```
cnpm install @vssue/vuepress-plugin-vssue
cnpm install @vssue/api-gitee-v5

# secret_example.js

```


secret.js

```js
const vssue_gitee ={
    platform: 'gitee',
    // all other options of Vssue are allowed
    owner: 'eleksbai', // 
    repo: 'blog', // 
    clientId: 'YOUR_CLIENT_ID',
    clientSecret: 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET',
}
module.exports = {
    "vssue": vssue_gitee
}
```


docs/.vuepress/config.js

```js
const secret =  require("./secret");
const vssue = secret.vssue
module.exports = { 
    // ....
    plugins:
        {
            '@vssue/vuepress-plugin-vssue': {
                // set `platform` rather than `api`
                platform: vssue.platform,
                owner: vssue.owner,
                repo: vssue.repo,
                clientId: vssue.clientId,
                clientSecret: vssue.clientSecret,
            },
            '@vuepress/back-to-top':{}
        },
    // ...
}
```

## 


[Vuepress Plugin Auto Sidebar](https://shanyuhai123.github.io/vuepress-plugin-auto-sidebar/zh/)

```shell
yarn add -D  vuepress-plugin-auto-sidebar
```

## 

1. [](https://coder.itclan.cn/fontend/tools/vuepress-build-blog/#%E5%B1%95%E7%A4%BA%E6%AF%8F%E4%B8%AA%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2%E7%9A%84%E4%BE%A7%E8%BE%B9%E6%A0%8F)
2. [](https://www.vuepress.cn/guide/)

Post.title: vssue gitee
Post.author: eleksbai
Post._content:
## 
  
Github Pages
codingvuepressvuevuepress
vssuegiteegitee
vssuegitee 


### [vuepress](https://vuepress.vuejs.org/zh/)
Vue [GitHub Pagesjekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/github-pages/)
 

### [vssue](https://vssue.js.org/zh/)
vuepress gitissue
 GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Gitee  Gitea
@vssue/api-gitee-v5

### [](https://vssue.js.org/zh/guide/gitee.html)
 

## 
vssue+gitee 
url
@vssue/api-gitee-v5urlhttp://localhost:8080/2022/10/29/vuepress-quick-start/  
http://localhost:8080/url
[demo](https://vssue.js.org/zh/demo/gitee.html)
![](/images/2022/gitee-callback-error.png)

## 
1. 
2. 

### vssueapi-gitee-v5,

1. callbackURL, `window.location.protocol + '//' + window.location.host`.
2. proxy, giteeCORS,.vssue.
3. redirect_uricallbackURL.
4. path.`sessionStorage.setItem('cacheOriginPath', this.getCurrentPath());`

### enhanceApp.js
,vssue,path.(,)
path, path.
enhanceApp.js
```

function getCacheOriginPath() {
    const cacheOriginPath = sessionStorage.getItem('cacheOriginPath');
    sessionStorage.setItem('cacheOriginPath', '');
    console.log(`get cacheOriginPath  ${cacheOriginPath}`);
    return cacheOriginPath || '';
}


export default ({
                    Vue, // the version of Vue being used in the VuePress app
                    options, // the options for the root Vue instance
                    router, // the router instance for the app
                    siteData // site metadata
                }) => {
    // ...apply enhancements to the app
    console.log("enhanceApp ...",)
    const cacheOriginPath = getCacheOriginPath()
    if (cacheOriginPath) {
        console.log("change path", window.location.href, cacheOriginPath)
        window.location.href = window.location.protocol + '//' + window.location.host + cacheOriginPath + window.location.search;
    }


// http://localhost:8080/2022/10/29/vuepress-quick-start/
}
```


## 
1. `@vuepress/theme-blog`, `@vssue/api-gitee-v5`.
2. vssue`git clone  git@gitee.com:eleksbai/vssue.git`
3. `cd vssue && yarn install`
4.  `cd packages/@vssue/api-gitee-v5 && yarn build`
5. `yarn link`
6. , `yarn link @vssue/api-gitee-v5`
7. `yarn dev`

### enhanceApp.js
,vssue,path.(,)
path, path.
enhanceApp.js
```

function getCacheOriginPath() {
    const cacheOriginPath = sessionStorage.getItem('cacheOriginPath');
    sessionStorage.setItem('cacheOriginPath', '');
    console.log(`get cacheOriginPath  ${cacheOriginPath}`);
    return cacheOriginPath || '';
}


export default ({
                    Vue, // the version of Vue being used in the VuePress app
                    options, // the options for the root Vue instance
                    router, // the router instance for the app
                    siteData // site metadata
                }) => {
    // ...apply enhancements to the app
    console.log("enhanceApp ...",)
    const cacheOriginPath = getCacheOriginPath()
    if (cacheOriginPath) {
        console.log("change path", window.location.href, cacheOriginPath)
        window.location.href = window.location.protocol + '//' + window.location.host + cacheOriginPath + window.location.search;
    }


// http://localhost:8080/2022/10/29/vuepress-quick-start/
}
```

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
## 

:
: ubuntu 20.04
: WebStorm
node: v16.18.0
npm: v8.19.2

## 

```bash
# hexo-cli 
npm install -g hexo-cli
# 
hexo init
```



## 

jekyllVuePress, year-month-day-title.
`_config.yml`, :
```yaml
# 
new_post_name: :year-:month-:day-:title.md
# ,copy, 
# post_asset_folder: true
```
,,,.
,.

```bash
hexo new "Hexo quick start"
```



## 
, .
1. `_config.yml` 
2. `_config.<theme_name>.yml`
3. `themes/<theme_name>/_config.yml`

`_config.<theme_name>.yml`,

## next
https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next
[next ](https://theme-next.js.org/docs/theme-settings/)
```bash
cd <hexo project>
# , , npm
git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next
# npm
npm install hexo-theme-next
```

`_config.yml`
```yml
theme: next
```
next`themes/next/_config.yml`


## 

```bash
# 
hexo server
```

##  github pages

`_config.yml`, github

```bash
# Deployment
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment
deploy:
  type: 'git'
  repo: 'git@github.com:eleksbai/eleksbai.github.io.git'
  branch: gh-pages
```

`hexo clean && hexo deploy`github.

githubpage, github page`gh-pages`,
Project(***.github.io) >> Settings >> Pages >> Branch >> gh-pages

## github.iojekyllhexo

:

1. github***.io.
2. , hexo.
3. ***.io_posthexosource/_posts
4. ***.io,.git
5. hexo***.io.

## 

[Documentation | Hexo](https://hexo.io/docs/)

Post.title: celery_first
Post._content:
# celery_first 
## 
celery 



1. 
2. 
3. 
4. 

## 


tasks.py
~~~python
from celery import Celery

app = Celery('tasks', broker='pyamqp://guest@192.168.146.129//', backend='redis://192.168.146.129')


@app.task
def add(x, y):
    # 12
    for i in range(123456):
        a = 999 ** 999
        del a
    return x + y
~~~


1. 
2.  


celery -A your_app_name worker --pool=solo -l info
windows
celery -A your_app_name worker --pool=solo -l info

## 


1. 
2. 
3. id
4. 

****







tasks.py
~~~python
import time
def test_run():
    r1 = add.delay(10, 1)
    r2 = add.delay(10, 2)
    i = 1
    while 1:
        print('%s' % i, r1.result, r2.result)
        if r1.result and r2.result:
            break
        time.sleep(1)
        i += 1
~~~


1. pycharm  tasks.py Run with Python console
2. test_run()
